attributes.action: Force Banks and other financial institutions to provide freephone numbers for customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Customers of Banks, Building Societies and other financial concerns are forced to make, in some cases very exoensive telephone calls to these.  In the main, these calls are for information purposes and the length of time it takes to actually speak to a human being in the right department can take anything up to ten minutes.  This is blatant profiteering on the part of these institutions and we the customers pay.
